text:
Year 1:
Management fee: 100 x 2% = 2
Gross value end of year (given): $125.75 million
Incentive fee: [125.75 - 100 - 2 - (100 x 5%)] x 20% = $3.75 million
Total fee: 2 + 3.75 = $5.75 million
Ending value net of fees: 125.75 - 5.75 = $120.00 million
Net return to investors: (120 / 100) - 1 = 20.00%
